setSearchItem(e.targer.value)} />
{ productData .filter((item) => { if (searchItem.value === '') return item if (item.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchItem.toLocaleLowerCase)) returnitem }) .map((item) => ( )) }
) } export default AllFoods
